名.definition: name; noun (part of speech); place (e.g. among winners); famous; classifier for people

名不副實.definition: the name does not reflect the reality (idiom); more in name than in fact; Reality does not live up to the name.; Excellent theory, but the practice does not bear it out.

名不正言不順.pinyin: míng bù zhèng yán bù shùn
名不正言不順.definition: (of a title, degree etc) illegitimately conferred

名不符實.definition: the name does not correspond to reality (idiom); it doesn't live up to its reputation

名不虛傳.definition: (idiom) to live up to one's famous name; its reputation is well deserved

名不見經傳.definition: (lit.) name not encountered in the classics; unknown (person); nobody

名人錄.definition: record of famous men; anthology of biographies

名優.definition: excellent quality; outstanding (product); abbr. for 名牌優質|名牌优质; (old) famous actor or actress

名列.definition: to rank (number 1, or third last etc); to be among (those who are in a particular group)

名利場.definition: competitive environment where individuals vie for recognition and material gain

名利雙收.definition: both fame and fortune (idiom); both virtue and reward

名副其實.definition: not just in name only, but also in reality (idiom); aptly named; worthy of the name

名勝.definition: a place famous for its scenery or historical relics; scenic spot; CL:處|处[chu4]

名嘴.definition: well-known commentator; talking head; pundit; prominent TV or radio host

名噪一時.definition: to achieve fame among one's contemporaries (idiom); temporary or local celebrity

名垂青史.definition: lit. reputation will go down in history (idiom); fig. achievements will earn eternal glory

名堂.definition: item (in a program of entertainments); trick (act of mischief); worthwhile result; accomplishment; sth significant but not immediately apparent; sth more than meets the eye

名士.definition: (old) a person of literary talent; a celebrity (esp. a distinguished literary person having no official post)

名字.definition: name (of a person or thing); CL:個|个[ge4]

名存實亡.definition: the name remains, but the reality is gone (idiom)

名家.definition: renowned expert; master (of an art or craft)

名宿.definition: renowned senior figure; luminary; legend (in academia, sport etc)

名實.definition: name and reality; how sth is portrayed and what it is actually like

名師出高徒.definition: A famous teacher trains a fine student (idiom). A cultured man will have a deep influence on his successors.

名從主人.definition: (idiom) to refer to sth by the name its owners use; to refer to a place by the name its inhabitants use (e.g. refer to Seoul as 首爾|首尔[Shou3 er3] rather than 漢城|汉城[Han4 cheng2])

名揚四海.definition: to become known far and wide (idiom); famous

名曲.definition: famous song; well-known piece of music

名次.definition: position in a ranking of names; place; rank

名正言順.definition: in a way that justifies the use of the term; genuine; proper; in a way that conforms to logic; justifiable; appropriate; perfectly legitimate

名為.definition: to be called; to be known as

名目.definition: name; designation; item; rubric; (formal usage) fame

名目繁多.definition: names of many kinds (idiom); items of every description

名相.definition: famous prime minister (in ancient China); names and appearances (Buddhism)

名稱.definition: name (of a thing); name (of an organization)

名義.definition: name; titular; nominal; in name; ostensible purpose

名臣.definition: important official or statesman (in feudal China)

名落孫山.definition: lit. to fall behind Sun Shan 孫山|孙山[Sun1 Shan1] (who came last in the imperial examination) (idiom); fig. to fail an exam; to fall behind (in a competition)

名角兒.definition: erhua variant of 名角[ming2 jue2]

名譽.definition: fame; reputation; honor; honorary; emeritus (of retired professor)

名譽博士學位.pinyin: míng yù bó shì xué wèi

名譽學位.definition: honorary degree; academic degree Honoris Causa

名譽掃地.definition: to be thoroughly discredited; to fall into disrepute

名重識暗.definition: of great reputation but shallow in knowledge (idiom)

名量詞.definition: nominal classifier (in Chinese grammar); measure word applying mainly to nouns

名錶.definition: famous watch (i.e. expensive brand of wristwatch)

名門望族.definition: offspring a famous family (idiom); good breeding; blue blood

名間.definition: Mingjian or Mingchien Township in Nantou County 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 Xian4], central Taiwan

名間鄉.definition: Mingjian or Mingchien Township in Nantou County 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 Xian4], central Taiwan

名鞿利鞚.definition: see 名韁利鎖|名缰利锁[ming2jiang1-li4suo3]

名韁利鎖.definition: (idiom) the shackles of fame and fortune

名額.definition: quota; number of places; place (in an institution, a group etc)

名馳遐邇.definition: To have one's fame spread far and wide. (idiom)
